attributes.action: Ban to sale of single use vapes.  They are marketed to teenagers
attributes.additional_details: These products are having a too large impact on Young people and the environment. They are being dropped as litter and contain a battery. Young children are picking them up to try. they are a plague in Secondary education. they are very easy for the underage to obtain.
attributes.background: Ban the sale of single use vapes within the United Kingdom to protect young people and the environment.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628115
